import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SingUp=()=>{const[name,setName]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const auth=localStorage.getItem('user');if(auth){navigate('/');}});const collectData=async()=>{console.warn(name,email,password);//passing 1st parameter
let result=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/register",{method:'post',body:JSON.stringify({name,email,password}),headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}});result=await result.json();console.warn(result);localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(result));navigate('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"please go to the login page"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"signup",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"REGISTER"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"username",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter Username",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter Email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",name:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter Password",required:true})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:collectData,type:"submit",children:"Sign Up"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"foot",children:["Already have an account?",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:"LOGIN"})]})]})]});};export default SingUp;
